programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.desc: A narrow escape from a raging wildfire – a dramatic encounter with a mudslide - the jaw-dropping images of a flash flood – just some of the encounters with two of nature’s most destructive forces caught on camera in this Fire and Water episode.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.desc: A catastrophic earthquake, a mesmerizing avalanche, a destructive tornado, and an unintentional smashup derby on icy highways; our experts weigh in on these viral videos as people get caught off guard by the sudden and powerful forces of nature.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.desc: In these viral videos we witness how, in the blink of an eye, your day can become suddenly dangerous. Even on a beautiful day, when you're not expecting any severe weather at all, Mother Nature can sometimes be malicious and sneaky

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: Captured: Extreme Weather | Super El Niño
programme.desc: El Niño is a temperature anomaly in the Pacific Ocean that affects weather patterns around the globe. In this episode we show some of the costly and deadly weather that can result when a Super El Niño occurs.

programme.title: Viral Wild
programme.desc: Take a look at the beautiful little Aquatic creatures that add cuteness to the vast marine life

programme.desc: Witness the scary and upclose encounters with the Aquatic wildlife

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: A white monster charges up the Eastern Seaboard, and 80 million citizens are in its path.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: Doubt and disbelief plague the Stormhunters after an exhaustive chase through Tornado Alley. The team is forced to make an uncomfortable decision. Do they play it safe or push past their fear?

programme.title: Hellfire Heroes
programme.desc: A man gets trapped in his pickup after a high-speed collision; a car fire raises suspicions of foul play.
